"MomentQualifyingDateAttribute": "Add_Profile.Enrollment.EnrollmentDate", "MomentOffers": [ { "MomentCode": "${ClientMoments#MomentGapEnrollmentStore}", "EventType": "Add_Profile", "OfferName":
